Sentencas: In this contribution the electrochemical properties of a series of CCO-CGO composite cathodes were studied as function of composition and layer thickness in a symmetrical cell set-up.

Sentencas: The lowest area specific resistance (ASR) was obtained for the CCO50-50 composition with 3 layer applications (21 mu m thickness) with an ASR of 0.5 Omega.cm(2) at 700 degrees C.
